title.rendered: NEWTECONS AND BOHO DÉCOR STARTED TO CONSTRUCT LONG AN FURNITURE FACTORY PROJECT

content.rendered:
(Long An – May 28, 2019) Newtecons Construction Investment Joint Stock Company and BoHo Décor Company successfully organized the groundbreaking ceremony of the BoHo Décor Factory project at Lot 29, Road 7, Tan Duc Industrial Park, Duc Hoa Ha Commune, Duc Hoa district, Long An province.

Representative of the Investor – BoHo Décor Company and Design & Build General Contractor – Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company at the ceremony

BoHo Décor factory is a factory specializing in furniture production with a total area of ​​30,000m2, green area up to 7500m2. As a Design & Build General contractor, Newtecons will implement constructing, finishing and ME works.  in this project. According to BoHo Décor, the project plays an important role in R&D strategy and promotes the company’s Design & Build interior capabilities. Specifically, in the future this factory will support the process of research and production of products that meet quality requirements that are competitive in the market.

Mr. Nguyen Dang Hoang Chuong – General Director of BoHo Décor shared, “For us, Newtecons is the contractor that meets the expectations of D&B of the project at this time. This is also the first time BoHo Décor and Newtecons cooperate directly as investors and construction contractors. I hope that in the future, we will continue to cooperate with other contractors in Coteccons Group system ”.

Previously, these two companies together with members of Coteccons Group carried out some successful big projects, such as Paihong Binh Duong Factory, GainLucky Tay Ninh Factory, City Garden Project … Right after the ceremony, Newtecons’s site management  teamand BoHo Décor quickly deployed their work with the goal of  completing project meeting all requirement about progress, quality.

Some outstanding images:

Owner of BoHo Décor Company

The entire Newtecons site management team at the project
